rundown: 9-4 W @ Washington Nationals Hurston Waldrep: 5.0 innings, 3 earned runs, 5 hits, 0 HR, 8 strikeouts Batters: Marcell Ozuna (3 hits - 5 AB, 0 HR, 3 RBI) Matt Olson (3 hits - 4 AB, 1 HR, 1 RBI) Ha-Seong Kim (2 hits - 4 AB, 0 HR, 2 RBI) The Braves secured a convincing victory over the Washington Nationals, showcasing a strong offensive performance. Key highlights include Marcell Ozuna's standout game with three hits and three RBIs, Matt Olson contributing with a home run and three hits, and Ha-Seong Kim adding two hits and two RBIs. The Braves' pitching was solid, with Waldrep striking out eight batters, helping to limit the Nationals to four runs. Overall, the combination of effective hitting and pitching led to the Braves' win.
